item.title: [HIVEMALL-236] to_json cause KryoException/NullPointerException with ArrayList due to Kryo bug
item.description:
SELECT
  from_json(
    '{ "person" : { "name" : "makoto" , "age" : 37 } }',
    'struct<name:string,age:int>', 
    array('person')
  )

to_json cause the following Kryo exception depending on underlying Kryo version.
